name: TeamHQ Redesign v2
description: Visual redesign of the TeamHQ landing page — switching from dark theme with rose accent to clean light theme with royal jaguar green (#006B3F), inspired by youngjerks.com aesthetic.

tasks.title: Scoped redesign v2 requirements
subtasks: Defined light theme direction — white backgrounds, dark text, clean and quiet
Researched and recommended royal jaguar green (#006B3F) with supporting shades
Specified typography change: Geist for everything, drop Atkinson Hyperlegible Mono
Defined card treatment simplification — no shadows, no hover transforms, thin borders only
Listed removals: noise overlay, hero radial gradient, frosted glass nav, eyebrow labels
Scoped as CSS-layer refresh — no HTML structure changes, no JS changes
Wrote 15 acceptance criteria covering all visual changes
Flagged risks: logo on white, agent identity color contrast, docs.html impact
decisions: Light theme over refined dark — matches Young Jerks reference and CEO direction
Geist for headings over adding Neue Haas Grotesk — already loaded, avoids new font dependency
No architecture step needed — pure CSS/visual refresh
docs.html redesign deferred to separate pass

tasks.title: Created design spec with exact token values and component treatments
subtasks: Mapped all semantic token changes: backgrounds, text, accent, borders, shadows, radius, font-heading
Added 3 new green accent RGB tokens for rgba() usage
Audited all 12 agent identity colors for WCAG AA contrast on white — none pass at -400
Created 18 new --color-agent-*-text tokens using -600 variants for accessible text
Wrote component-level specs for all 16 component types
Documented all hover/interaction states for cards, links, buttons, and form inputs
Audited logo SVG — flagged rose gradient and $ symbol needing color updates
Listed all hardcoded dark values and rgba(white) patterns needing manual replacement
decisions: Uniform 4px border-radius across all components — matches Young Jerks sharp edges
Remove all card shadows, keep shadow-lg only for floating elements (modals, toasts)
Activity grid empty cells: #f0f0f0 light gray fill instead of transparent
Left-align section headings for editorial feel

tasks.title: Implementing redesign v2 across all CSS and HTML files
